analysis.description:
DSMath.mul (/unique_chucks/13/0x93c3a7a88e7fa616bd299e5790d98e72709679a8.sol#91-95) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(y == 0 || (z = x * y) / y == x)

SaiLPC.pool (/unique_chucks/13/0x93c3a7a88e7fa616bd299e5790d98e72709679a8.sol#547-557) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-gem.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,wad) (/unique_chucks/13/0x93c3a7a88e7fa616bd299e5790d98e72709679a8.sol#556-557)

SaiLPC.exit (/unique_chucks/13/0x93c3a7a88e7fa616bd299e5790d98e72709679a8.sol#559-566) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-gem.transfer(msg.sender,wad) (/unique_chucks/13/0x93c3a7a88e7fa616bd299e5790d98e72709679a8.sol)

SaiLPC.take (/unique_chucks/13/0x93c3a7a88e7fa616bd299e5790d98e72709679a8.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-pay.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,jam) (/unique_chucks/13/0x93c3a7a88e7fa616bd299e5790d98e72709679a8.sol)
	-gem.transfer(msg.sender,wad) (/unique_chucks/13/0x93c3a7a88e7fa616bd299e5790d98e72709679a8.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0x93c3a7a88e7fa616bd299e5790d98e72709679a8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_chucks/13/0x93c3a7a88e7fa616bd299e5790d98e72709679a8.sol#1): it allows old versions
